full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSKANG BSHAGS LHA MO DGYES PA'I RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI DAD DAM GTZANG ZHING RLABS CHEN BSOD NAMS KYI RGYAB BRTEN BRAG LTAR SRA BA'I GU SHR'I BLO GROS RGYA MTSO NAS 'DI LTAR BRTZOM ZHIG PAR BSKUL NGOR, SA MTHA'I NA SMYON BSTAN 'DZIN RAB RGYAS SAM, GSANG MTSAN GDOD MA'I RANG GROL GYIS 'THOL BYUNG DU SMRAS PA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD RAB MYUR YE SHES BLO LDAN GYIS BGYIS PA SARBA SIDDHI DZA YANTU, ,SA MA YA RGYA RGYA RGYA::)
